description:
This course is designed by a German Native speaker who holds a degree in teaching German as a second Language:

1-It is about learning German with a new method combining Grammar and vocabulary at the same time (rather than learning grammar and nothing else)

2- Video materials, documents, texts, exercises, Printable Documents and more.

3-This course is built around 34Lectures, exercises, Solutions and downloadables.

and is built around 5 core Topics:

*Basic Grammar, Vocabulary and Pronunciation .

*Getting in contact with people (Grammar, Phrases and vocabulary)

*Days, months and numbers(with dialogues Explained)

* In The city : Directions, in the bakery, Restaurant and co.

*Fruit and vegetables, Colors, Vocabulary and Grammar (Useful Verbs)
title: German For absolute Beginners
